segments.text: Could you tell me a little about the organization ? For example , how big is your workforce here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well in total we have around 150 employees based in Hong Kong with another 400 in our head office in Beijing . The news desk staff in Hong Kong comprises around 80 staff .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . And how about the working hours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , as you know Rebecca , in journalism work hours are not exactly nine to five . You could be on call at any time . We do have to work very unsociable hours at times .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well I am used to that , Mr . Parsons , so that â€™ s not really a shock for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good , as long as you understand that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And when do you need to fill the vacancy , Mr . Parsons ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yesterday ! But no , we are hoping to start from the beginning of next month .
segments.speaker: S2
